author: jgsailors
title: First Vacation in New York - Review
text: This was an amazing experience and the hotel exceeded our expectations. Everyone was very helpful and held our bags during check out so we can explore the area. The staff made terrific recommendations regarding restaurants in the area and it was delicious. The room and hotel was clean and the customer service was exceptional.
